"Who's there?!": "Ahhh, so it was you..."
"You seem troubled..."
"What's the matter?"
"Oh. No..."
"No, it's nothing..."

"When I come here,
I can't help but be reminded."
"Of our fight with Nilus Stia..."

"And how that one
soldier gave his life..."
"...to protect someone like me..."
"Don't blame yourself."
"That was his duty."
"His duty... was to protect us?"
"He had a life too, <%me>."

"He probably had so many things he wanted to do.
Dreams he wanted to fulfill."

"And I... took all of that
away from him... forever..."

"I cannot approve of
that line of thinking."
"Kanui?!"

"My apologies. I heard
some voices over here."

"May I speak about the
Stia Vanguard for a moment?"

"One of our rules is to
\"Never abandon your allies\"."

"In battle, enemies aren't
the most terrifying thing."

"Being unable to trust your
own comrades is far more terrifying."

"The thought of possibly being left behind
if you get isolated or injured in battle."

"Worries like that would constantly haunt
you if you didn't trust your comrades."

"That rule was made in an
effort to eradicate that fear."

"The troops can depend on
one another without worry."

"We build up mutual trust,
and we carry out our mission."

"The soldier who protected you
was merely following that rule."

"He saw you in danger and made
the decision. \"Don't abandon her\"."
"\"More people will survive if she lives.\""
"I believe that's what he was thinking."
"And then, the battle progressed as it did."

"...No! All I did was let
my anger take over, and then...!"
"In battle, results are everything."

"Of course, the process is important,
but our concern at the end of the day is thus:"

"\"How many enemies were defeated,
and how many allies survived?\""

"If many people have to give their lives, the one
who has to bear that burden is Commander Guren."

"And of course, so
do I, as Adjutant."

"That soldier simply
did what he had to do."

"So please, stand tall and
look towards the future."
"Kanui..."
"That is all I have to say."
"...Thank you."

"Not at all. I was merely intruding
on your conversation."

"I'll be returning to my
mission out here. Farewell."

"...It's going to be hard
to sort out these feelings..."

"But Kanui's right. I have to try
moving forward beyond this."

"Not least of all for that ARKS who...
sacrificed his future for me."
